goal: Modularize the monolithic Tiptap Editor and clean up the remainder of EditorRoot.

tasks.title: Modularize Tiptap Hooks
tasks.description: Extract `useEditorExtensions.ts`, `useSmartLinkClickHandler.ts`, and `useTypewriterScroll.ts` from `Editor.tsx` to reduce its bloat and clarify the Tiptap setup lifecycle.

tasks.title: Extract Workspace Panels
tasks.description: Move the massive `panels.map(...)` logic taking over 50 lines in `EditorRoot.tsx` into a dedicated `<WorkspacePanels />` component.

tasks.title: DRY Editor Rendering
tasks.description: Unify the identical `<Editor>` JSX blocks scattered across the four separate layout modes in `EditorRoot.tsx` into a single, clean factory function or memoized component.
